about_the_game:
NOW EVERY JOURNEY CAN BE AN ADVENTURE!


No longer does a GM have to struggle to make journeys exciting or hand wave them away by saying "You arrive at your destination."

The worlds of Hellfrost are vast, and full of wonder, mystery, and peril. With the aid of this source book, even the shortest journey can be an adventure in itself!

This book is a guide to all things travel related and covers both Hellfrost and Land of Fire.

This source book includes:

  • Rules for seeking divine blessings before starting a journey.
  • Revised rules for hunting, vessels, and journeys over land, water, and air, and through the subterranean realms.
  • Designing encounters, sites of interest, ruins, and islands.
  • Sample hazards.

Converted by: Kevin Doswell

Released on May 29, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
